missionstate.description: The Mayor of Bree ask you to find the old forgotten tools and book in the sewers.(first floor)
Go to the market, find Dimral and tell him about your {mission}.
Kill some chickens, you need 2 feathers.
Go to the Workshop near the market and ask Andrew the armourer to forge an bronze studded armor.The mayor gave you 1 copper ore and 1 tin ore, you will have to get 2 leathers and 5 coins.
Go back to the Workshop and ask Darren the Weaponsmaker to build a spear.
Go down to the sewers and look for the lost supplies (second floor), give the old map to the Mayor.
Go to Archet to the north and talk to Hudson about the {supplies} delivery.
Go to Staddle (South from Bree) and deliver the {supplies} to Osbald.
Go to the hill north of Staddle and kill the Raging Wolf.
Go to Archet and ask George about the {old mine}.
Go to the mine and find a hidden box on the second floor, go back to the mayor with the golden goblet.
Talk to the blue mountains dwarfs in the prancing pony bar.
Someone in Bree knows where are the bandits and the dwarfs jewel cases, ask everyone.
Go to the bandits lair and find the four lost jewel cases, then go back to the dwarfs.
Travel to East Brandywine Hills, take the road to the west and turn north before the hobbit town of Buckland, find Sergeant Otreblas Camp.
Search for the bandits camp where the renegades trade with them, and steal the 3 short swords.
Kill 20 Renegades in East Brandiwine Hills.
Kill 19 Renegades in East Brandiwine Hills.
Kill 18 Renegades in East Brandiwine Hills.
Kill 17 Renegades in East Brandiwine Hills.
Kill 16 Renegades in East Brandiwine Hills.
Kill 15 Renegades in East Brandiwine Hills.
Kill 14 Renegades in East Brandiwine Hills.
Kill 13 Renegades in East Brandiwine Hills.
Kill 12 Renegades in East Brandiwine Hills.
Kill 11 Renegades in East Brandiwine Hills.
Kill 10 Renegades in East Brandiwine Hills.
Kill 9 Renegades in East Brandiwine Hills.
Kill 8 Renegades in East Brandiwine Hills.
Kill 7 Renegades in East Brandiwine Hills.
Kill 6 Renegades in East Brandiwine Hills.
Kill 5 Renegades in East Brandiwine Hills.
Kill 4 Renegades in East Brandiwine Hills.
Kill 3 Renegades in East Brandiwine Hills.
Kill 2 Renegades in East Brandiwine Hills.
Kill 1 Renegade in East Brandiwine Hills.
An agent of sergeant Otrebla, called Harry, let the renegades to capture him in order to find information, look for him and the key of his prison door. He will give you a report for Otrebla
Search for the general of the renegades, Harald Ferner, and take him down.
You killed him! Go back to the sergeant.
Get 5 Breads and 3 salmons for Deniam.
Bring 10 leathers and 10 brown pieces of cloth to Jim.
Recover Aldreans stolen book from the eriador renegades in East Brandywine Hills.
Go to Bree and search for Harins son amulet.
Go back to Harin and deliver the amulet.
Hunt water buffaloes in the northen part of the north road, and get 3 horns and 5000 gp to buy a donkey from John Oatny.
Go to Staddle and find Otto Brockhouse, try to find what kind of present will be useful for him.
Tell Don that Otto needs a black sheep for his herd.
Travel along the lands looking for a black sheep.
Help Tom getting 20 halfling bread of speed.
Go to Don with the sheep.

mission.name: 1 Find Sergeant Farflank at South Downs

missionstate.description: Get information about South Downs from Sergeant Farflank!

mission.name: 2 Probe Sergeant Farflank and the boys you worth it

missionstate.description: Kill spiders and get Sergeant Farflank 20 spider silks.

mission.name: 3 Bring a tarantula egg to Sergeant Farflank

missionstate.description: Kill tarantulas and get Sergeant Farflank 5 tarantula eggs.

mission.name: 4 Probe Sergeant Farflank and the boys you worth it 2

missionstate.description: Take back the stolen boots from the bandits.
Kill the Boots Eater Tarantula. It spawns in the easter side of the spider pit.
Return the boots to Sergaent Farflank (just by killing the tarantula).
Get a scythe with Hildibrand the farmer.
Bring 10 bunches of wheat to Misses Daisy.
Kill Misses Daisy's cat and bring it's collar.
Look for 20 powder herbs, 20 mushrooms and catch 20 rainbow trout for Frederic. Search through the countryside and go fishing in the river.
Bring 10 white pieces of cloth, 20 brown pieces of cloth and 300 gold coins to Haroc.
Cath {40 rainbow trouts} for Frederic. Go fishing in the river.
Bring 10 blood herbs to Eryn, you will find some in the Barrow Downs.
Bring 5 Skulls to Eryn, you will find them by killing skeletons in the Barrow Downs.
Look for the memory stone of Gharazon the sorcerer of Numeror in the Barrow Downs.
Search for the tomb of the fallen warriors of Dagorlad and where Aerdinul lies, you will find there the healers book.
Basic herbal healing - Words: asea envinyata - Reagents: powder herbs.
Poison herbal antidote - Words: asea hloima envinyata - Reagents: powder herbs.

missionstate.description: Herbal Strong Healing Rune - Words: asea turca envinyata certa - lvl: 40 - mlvl: 15 - Reagents: blank rune and blood herbs.
Look for Larry Halfsnout, the leader of bandits in Midgewater and kill him. (Reward: 500 coins and 1 soldier helmet)
You got him, ask for your reward. (Reward: 500 coins and 1 soldier helmet)
Look for Doran Hawk, lider of the outlaws in Lone Lands and kill him. (Reward: 8000 coins and 1 small diamond)
You got him, ask for your reward. (Reward: 8000 coins and 1 small diamond)
Look for Gerald Ford, general of the eriador renegades and kill him. (Reward: 10000 coins and 1 small diamond)
You got him, ask for your reward. (Reward: 10000 coins and 1 small diamond)
You got them, ask for your reward.
Go to the misty mountains goblins camp and search for the lost dwarf body and the book he was carring.
Ask Brean to make 1 Strong Leather Armor for Eliana.
Strong Strike - Words: turca pente - lvl: 20 - mlvl: 7 - One concentrated hit.
Twisting Slash - Words: aucirhanc - lvl: 20 - mlvl: 7 - Hit everyone around you.
Shield Wall - Words: thangail - lvl: 20 - mlvl: 7 - Block with all you have.
Sharp Aim - Words: hendumaica - lvl: 20 - mlvl: 7 - Sharp you eyes.
Forced March - Words: nire eldo - lvl: 20 - mlvl: 7 - Use the strenght of your legs.
Spear Throw - Words: hatal pente - lvl: 40 - mlvl: 15 - Throw a spear.
Frontal Long Slash - Words: anda pente - lvl: 40 - mlvl: 15 - A long frontal hit.
Warrior Rage - Words: mahtar - lvl: 40 - mlvl: 15 - Attack with all your strenght.
Charge - Words: nor eldo - lvl: 40 - mlvl: 15 - Use your strenght to move much faster.
You got them, ask for your reward.
Kill Savages and get 5 damaged steel helmets for Nargor.
Travel to the Forsaken Inn for supplies for the rangers .
Go to Buckland and buy 20 salmons for the Inn keeper .
Go back to Nargor with the supplies.
Attack the goblins in the north of Weather Hills and get 10 bone swords to prove your kills to Nargor.
Go back to the goblin camp and kill their leader, Rorkduf.
Kill ghosts and get 5 magic sulphurs for Grein.

Find one Ainur statue and ask for blessing, you will need elemental jewels.

Find the dunedain spy in the second area of Fornost Erain.
Look for the book of rituals in the necromancers catacombs and take it to Bregor.
Find the elven sorcerer in the South Downs.

Look for Eranuir, the spy of Arador.
Go to the weather hills and infiltrate into the renegades camp (Near the goblins camp). Kill the witches delegate
Find the first key in a chest near the delegate. Now go to the witches camp and look for the second key around the old castle. You also have to kill the renegades delegate in the camp.
You got them, ask for your reward.
You got them, ask for your reward.

mission.name: Bread of the Green Dragon Inn

missionstate.description: Look for 20 powder herbs, 20 mushrooms and catch 20 flour units for Jim Boffin. Search through the countryside.
Look for a doll for Bungos son, Bilbo.

mission.name: Bread of the Green Dragon Inn (Part 2)

missionstate.description: Look for 1 haunch of boar for Jim Boffin.
Get 20 halfling bread of speed for Han Wheater.
Get 20 portions of flour, 10 cookies and 10 rainbow trouts for Tom Wooler.
You got them, ask for your reward.

mission.name: Halfling Bread of Speed - hobbit masta

missionstate.description: Halfling Bread of Speed - Words: hobbit masta - lvl: 20 - create a bread that makes you feel faster - Reagents: 5 flour and 5 mushrooms.
Corned Fish - Words: hobbit hala - lvl: 20 - cook your fish for extra nutrition - Reagents: 1 rainbow trout and 1 powder herb.
Cookies - Words: cookies craft - lvl: 10 - make tasty cookies - Reagents: 1 flour and 1 blueberry.

Get 30 wood pieces, 2 tin ores and 2 copper ores.
